definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: Encourage her release by constructing an erotic fantasy before things heat up.
sentences.chinese: 應當在高潮激發前鼓勵她通過性幻想放鬆自己。

sentences.english: Material evidence must also be original.
Be thou faithful until death: and I will give thee the crown of life.
sentences.chinese: 你應當忠信至死，我必要賜給你生命的華冠。

sentences.english: Thirdly, to obtain employment successfully, ex-servicemen should bring into play their predominance themselves too.
sentences.chinese: 再者，退役軍人在就業時也應當注意發揮自身優勢。

sentences.english: We must appoint a new teacher soon.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一位總經理，他應當任人爲賢。

sentences.english: The customs house shall make examination on the person under custody within the legal detention period.
sentences.chinese: 海關應當在法定扣留期限內對被扣留人進行審查。

sentences.english: For biological products, samples from several consecutively manufactured batches should be submitted.
sentences.chinese: 對於生物製品，應當要提交連續幾個生產批次的樣品。

sentences.english: Bokova that media facilities should not be the target of military operations.
sentences.chinese: 博科娃指出，媒體設施不應當成爲軍事行動的目標。

sentences.english: Anyone who loses his resident identity card shall apply for reissue of a card.
sentences.chinese: 居民身份證丟失的，應當申請補領。

sentences.english: Everyone should make a contribution to protecting the environment.
sentences.chinese: 每個人都應當爲保護環境做貢獻。

sentences.english: Metronomes should not be over used.
sentences.chinese: 節拍器也不應當被濫用。

sentences.english: Then Peter and the other apostles answered and said, We ought to obey God rather than men.
sentences.chinese: 彼得和衆使徒回答說，順從神，不順從人，是應當的。

sentences.english: You ought to know better than to go out without an overcoat on such a cold day.
sentences.chinese: 你應當懂得這樣冷的天不穿大衣出去可不行。

sentences.english: An enterprise as a legal person shall conduct operations within the range approved and registered.
sentences.chinese: 企業法人應當在覈准登記的經營範圍內從事經營。

sentences.english: But the prosecutor declined on the grounds that the issue should be investigated in the US.
sentences.chinese: 但檢察官拒絕的理由是，這個案子應當在美國調查。

sentences.english: A poet is, before anything else, a person who is passionately in love with language. -W. H.
sentences.chinese: 一個詩人，首先應當是一個非常熱愛語言的人。

definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
to explain/to illustrate/to indicate/to show/to prove/explanation/directions/caption/CL:個|个[ge4]
